pages.text: $(#bd951a)Health:$()$(#ff0000)180$(br)$(#bd951a)Damage:$()$(#ff0000)180(tackle), 7(normal)$(br)$(#bd951a)Speed:$()$(#ff0000)Fast$(br)$(#bd951a)Special:$()$(#ff0000)Tackles the first plant it sees.$(br2)$(#bd951a)Berserker is always rampaging. Tackling this, tackling that, his neighbors are always complaining about the flying junk that ends up in their yards as a result of all the tackling.

pages.title: BLOOM & DOOM SEED CO.
pages.text: $(#25228d)They are like Football Zombies, but more annoying.
